statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Alex Stepheson finished with 14 points and 10 rebounds, and Southern California fended off a late rally to secure a 60-56 victory over Washington State.
article.headline: Alex Stepheson-led USC fends off Washington State
article.linkText: Stepheson-led USC fends off Washington State
article.story: LOS ANGELES -- Alex Stepheson finished with 14 points and 10 rebounds, and Southern California fended off a late rally to secure a 60-56 victory over Washington State on Friday. Washington State scored 11 straight points to get within 58-56 on Abe Lodwick's 3-pointer with 1:19 remaining. The Cougars had a chance to tie or go ahead on the ensuing possession, but Klay Thompson's pass hit off the hands of Lodwick and bounced out of bounds. Following an intentional foul, Donte Smith iced it with a pair of free throws for USC (9-6, 1-1 Pac-10). Nikola Vucevic had 12 points and 11 rebounds for USC, while Smith scored 14 points, including four 3-pointers, off the bench. DeAngelo Casto had 18 points for Washington State (10-4, 0-2), which suffered its third straight loss. Thompson struggled through a rough shooting night to score 17 points on 6-of-18 from the floor.
